recentDecisions.decision: Memory context compilation happens in /start Phase 1 before local status
recentDecisions.rationale: Ensures context is available for session startup

recentDecisions.decision: Success/failure recording happens immediately after verification
recentDecisions.rationale: Captures outcomes while context is fresh

recentDecisions.decision: All memory paths use v3.0 structure (.claude-harness/memory/...)
Memory entries always include feature ID for cross-feature queries
Orchestrator uses loop-state.json for verification loop; agents use agent-context.json
Verification is MANDATORY - never trust self-assessment

lessons: Test setup.sh in the harness repo itself to catch inception issues
Consider upgrade path when making breaking changes
Delete unused code (templates) rather than trying to sync it
Never trust self-assessment - always run actual verification commands
Loop state must persist across context windows
Both setup.sh AND commands/setup.md must be updated together
